term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - coupled simultaneous techniques in analysis
term.title: coupled simultaneous techniques

item.text: The application of two or more techniques to the same sample when the two instruments involved are connected through an interface, e.g. simultaneous thermal analysis and mass spectrometry.
